SENT.plain: A 29 year old woman is reported with bloody diarrhoea three hours after developing anaphylactoid shock
Sigmoidoscopy, barium enema, and histology showed rectal and colonic ischaemia to the splenic flexure
There was no history of vascular disease but the patient was taking an oral contraceptive
Thirty one other cases of spontaneous ischaemic proctitis are reviewed
